item_rules_dice.name: dice rules plaque
item_rules_dice.description:
A polished brass plaque reading:

--- HIGH STAKES DICE ---
1. Player rolls 1-100.
2. House rolls 1-100.
3. Highest roll wins.
4. Ties go to the House.

item_rules_slots.name: payout chart
item_rules_slots.description:
A framed chart mounted on the wall:

--- CLOCKWORK SLOTS ---
[DRG][DRG][DRG] - 100x (Jackpot)
[CWN][CWN][CWN] - 25x
[POT][POT][POT] - 15x
[SHD][SHD][SHD] - 10x
[DAG][DAG][DAG] - 5x
Any Pair - 1x (Refund)

item_rules_wheel.name: mystic inscription
item_rules_wheel.description:
Glowing letters floating in the air:

--- ELEMENTAL WHEEL ---
VOID   - Loss
EARTH  - 1x
FIRE   - 2x
ICE    - 5x
AETHER - 10x

item_rules_blackjack.name: velvet sign
item_rules_blackjack.description:
A small sign on the table:

--- TWENTY-ONE ---
Beat the Dealer's hand without exceeding 21.
Dealer stands on 17.
Blackjack pays 3:2.
Commands: 'hit' to take a card, 'stand' to hold.

item_rules_runebreaker.name: rune tablet
item_rules_runebreaker.description:
A stone tablet engraved with instructions:

--- RUNEBREAKER ---
1. The Vault is locked by 3 Runes.
2. Possible Runes: Fire, Water, Earth, Air.
3. Guess the sequence to unlock.
4. 8 Attempts allowed.

Feedback:
- Perfect: Right Rune, Right Spot.
- Partial: Right Rune, Wrong Spot.

Payout: 5x Wager.
